trans-unit.source: Represents a date selection range in a month calendar control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> is the date or dates selected and highlighted on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MonthCalendar> control.
If only one date is selected, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values will be equal.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> can be changed by the user clicking a date while dragging the mouse pointer across the desired dates, or you can set the range in code.

For example, you might want to have the user enter a date range into two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox> controls or two <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DateTimePicker> controls and set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> based on those dates.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref> class.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> values are set to `null` when this constructor is used.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref> class with the specified selection range.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values are assigned the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property values of the assigned <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange> object.
The existing <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref> class with the specified beginning and ending dates.

If the `lower`<xref:System.DateTime> value is greater than the `upper`<xref:System.DateTime> value, the `lower` value will be assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> property instead of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> property.
The starting date in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
The ending date in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
Gets or sets the ending date and time of the selection range.
The ending <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> value of the range.
Gets or sets the starting date and time of the selection range.
The starting <xref href="System.DateTime"></xref> value of the range.
Returns a string that represents the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the values for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.Start%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange.End%2A> properties.
A string that represents the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SelectionRange"></xref>.
